participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and humorous, Alex loves to express herself through her hobbies and enjoys a good laugh.
participant_1.background: I'd brag about my sense of humor. I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime. I have a pet dog who is always happy to see me, no matter how bad my day was. I make enough money to be able to enjoy my hobbies, like music. I'm passionate about exploring the unknown and creating my own style.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, Jordan has a love for music and enjoys the simplicity of childhood.
participant_2.background: I listen to my favorite bands to relax when I'm not at work. I don't care about the weather. I'm always trying to come up with new beats for my band. I am currently single but I am ready to mingle. I am ten years old and my family is like a library.

content.text: I'm doing good! It's a beautiful day.
It is, I love the sun. What do you like to do on sunny days?
I like to go to the park and play with my dog, or I listen to my favorite music.
That sounds like fun! I like to go for walks in the park.
What kind of music do you listen to?
I listen to a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock and pop music.
I like indie rock too! I also like some pop music.
That's cool! Do you have any favorite bands?
I like Foster the People, The 1975, and The Neighbourhood.
I like Foster the People too! I haven't heard of the other two bands.
You should check them out! They're really good.
I will! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Cool! I'm glad I could help.
Do you want to be friends?
Sure! I'd love to be friends.
Yay! I'm happy to make a new friend.
